column4: question about Ubuntu mailing lists: How do you access your subscription? you konw to change settings and such?
Go to https://lists.ubuntu.com/, pick the list you're subscribed to, then enter your email address in the bottom input box and click "Unsubscribe or edit options"
Yes, it's true. I run Jaunty, and my system has broken badly a few times. Thankfully, I know how to fix it, but if you don't, you shouldn't be using it.
Jaunty discussion belongs in #ubuntu+1, not here, as you know.
